description.ko: 유리 꽃잎과 논리 회로가 시대를 초월한 꽃 피는 안식처로 합쳐지는 디지털의 재탄생.
description.en: A digital rebirth where glass petals and logic boards merge into a timeless, blooming sanctuary.

prompt: A cascading waterfall of liquid cherry blossom petals made of iridescent glass, pouring over a mossy microchip cliffside where nature is reclaiming technology. The waterfall flows into a pool of soft pastel liquid light. Fractal flower patterns emerge from the silicon rock faces, featuring delicate translucent petals with binary-coded veins. 8k resolution, macro photography style, Unreal Engine 5. Intricate subsurface scattering on the glass petals and cinematic lighting that emphasizes the soft spring atmosphere. Focus on the interplay between organic growth and rigid circuitry.
